text: Table 2. 3L approach to differential diagnosis of NeuP* Listen Locate Look Neuropathic pain Common descriptors: The painful region may not Apply bedside sensory tests shooting, electric shock, burning, necessarily be the same as the Conduct aetiology-specific tests tingling, itching, numbness site of injury.
